# Stimulant Doctor — ADHD Medications & Focus Science

> Evidence-based guide to ADHD medications, nootropics, and focus optimization. Compare online ADHD assessment platforms, find treatments, understand your options.


Stimulant Doctor is an evidence-based resource for understanding ADHD medications, nootropics, and focus science. It compares online telehealth platforms for ADHD diagnosis (Cerebral, Done, Talkiatry), provides detailed medication guides (Adderall, Vyvanse, Ritalin, Concerta, Strattera, Wellbutrin), ranks the top 12 nootropics by evidence, and offers educational articles on ADHD, focus optimization, and cognitive enhancement. Includes a self-assessment tool and medical disclaimers.


## Pages

- [Homepage — ADHD medications and focus science guide](https://stimulant.doctor)
- [Telehealth Comparison — Cerebral vs Done vs Talkiatry for online ADHD assessment](https://stimulant.doctor#telehealth)
- [Medication Guide — Adderall, Vyvanse, Ritalin, and more](https://stimulant.doctor#medications)
- [Nootropic Rankings — Top 12 evidence-based cognitive enhancers](https://stimulant.doctor#nootropics)


## Keywords

ADHD medication, online ADHD diagnosis, Adderall, Vyvanse, nootropics, focus, telehealth ADHD, Cerebral, Done
